https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gdN1rQF2sYdNKBQI3sjpwR8jJul.jpg Set in the Dominican Republic, Leticia Tonos Paniagua’s uniquely Caribbean retelling of Romeo and Juliet chronicles the love between a kind-hearted teenager, ostracized for his mixed Haitian-Dominican descent, and the beautiful sister of a local drug kingpin he’s hired to protect. Cristo Rey
